text:
Dear Sir / Madam
To whom it may concern
Please find enclosed a reference for Thomas.
He entered employment with many years ago – he has worked both remotely – before it ever became popular and in an office environment.
He has been a reliable and ever-present member of our staff – with an always positive outlook and a diligent work focus.
His work ethic is easily proved in the number of placements (our recruitment industry metric) compared to other members of staff.
I believe were it not for the 2 Directors deciding to sell the business and retire he would still be a valuable contributor.
Your Sincerely
Cathy Pitt – Direct supervisor Dear Sir / Madam
